metadataAttributes.Title: Learning How to Learn: Powerful mental tools to help you master tough subjects
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: This course gives you easy access to the invaluable learning techniques used by experts in art, music, literature, math, science, sports, and many other disciplines. We’ll learn about how the brain uses two very different learning modes and how it encapsulates (“chunks”) information. We’ll also cover illusions of learning, memory techniques, dealing with procrastination, and best practices shown by research to be most effective in helping you master tough subjects.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Test Preparation,Learning To Learn,Pomodoro Technique,Meta Learning,
